help.title: Aero L-159A ALCA
help.line: Set full throttle and one click of flaps. Rotate at 150-160 kts depending on load.
Approach at 160 kts with full flaps. Land at 140 kts or more depending on load.
Flaps retract automatically at 170 and 200 KIAS.
You can use the ALCA menu to control lights, toggle ammo count reporting and
reload the cannon. The "Fuel and Payload" menu controls numerous payload options,
including fuel tanks, the PL-20 Plamen cannon pod and an experimental fuel probe.
You don't need to care about switching fuel tanks, fuel system automatically transfers
fuel to the Engine feed tank. Droptanks are emptied first. All tanks are also switched
